title: Worthy successor
review: I am glad to see that my initial skepticism was unjustified. This is a worthy successor of the Blade Runner and a masterpiece in the Sci-Fi genre. Acting, visuals and storytelling are flawless.

title: Again got fooled by paid IMDB ratings...
review: ... and wasted 2h on this shallow movie. Bad script and below average acting. Why would anyone want to make a movie like this?
